wikipedia_page.main: Christopher "Chris" Howard Bibb (3 June 1968) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and Yorkshire, and at club level for Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 616), and Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 1054) (loan), as an occasional goal-kicking fullback, i.e. number 1.

response: * Chris Bibb, British rugby league footballer
The Featherstone Rovers most tries in a match record of six tries is jointly held by; Chris Bibb, Brad Dwyer, and Mike Smith, Smith scored six tries against Doncaster on Saturday 13 April 1968.

link_mentions.page: List of Great Britain national rugby league team players

response: * Chris Bibb (also played for Featherstone Rovers & Great Britain)
The Featherstone Rovers most tries in a match record of six tries is jointly held by; Chris Bibb, Brad Dwyer, and Michael Smith, Dwyer scored six tries against Rochdale Hornets on Sunday 1 July 2018.
